thread.title: 5 things to definitely try in Dubai this weekend
thread.title_full: 5 things to definitely try in Dubai this weekend

title: 5 things to definitely try in Dubai this weekend
text:
5 things to definitely try in Dubai this weekend Web Team /Dubai   | Last updated on February 9, 2017 at 06.16 pm Share 
See Misbah take to the field tonight! (AFP) Get your cricket on, or try anything and everything this week! This weekend will be your chance to make the most out of Dubai! Check out our picks of great activities going on this week. Watch Misbah take to the field in Dubai When: February 9, Thursday Where: Dubai International Cricket Stadium From Dhs20, tickets available at location The Twenty20 cricket tournament is back in town for the second year and things are being kicked off by champions Islamabad United (with Misbah-ul-Haq) and Peshawar Zalmi. Cheer for your team this evening! Listen to a Bob Marley tribute - the right way When: February 10, Friday Tickets available here The late reggae legend Bob Marley celebrated his birthday earlier this week. In Dubai fashion, his son Ky-Mani Marley is coming to Dubai to headline a tribute concert for his dad. Other than that, also get to hear some of Dubai's local bands while enjoying amazing meals from food trucks. Try something... or some things When: February 10, Friday Where: Barasti Beach This is a free event Want to try skateboarding? Maybe pick up a new hobby or fitness regime? Then TryDubai is the place you'll want to check out. Entry to the event is free and from there you can check out many communities and clubs that are offering new experience to liven up your life in Dubai. They're also offering exclusivbe discounts only for the event! Be photograph savvy
